message.raw:
backporting patches from STABLE branch:
- http://q12.org/pipermail/ode-cvs/2005-July/000195.html

trimesh: always use Collider.GetContactStatus() in trimesh<->* colliders, as Collider.GetNbTouchedPrimitives() isn't otherwise reliable.

reported by Patrick Enoch.
